Creating a User ID Field

A default value cannot be established for a user ID field, because if the User ID is deleted, the value becomes invalid.

This procedure is a continuation of Creating a New Property Field.

To create a custom user ID field:

  1. From the Add Field dialog, select UserID from the Type text box.

  2. Select the Input required check box to make this a required field. Required fields are rarely used with files, because they affect the File Properties dialog only.

  3. Click OK.
